Class Rules

    • Rules
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Winner

    public class Rules
extends java.lang.Object
    W1007: Honors Intro to Computer Science Homework 1 Rules.java Purpose: This class encapsulates the rules and strings that are non-negotiable.
    Version:
    1.7 9/22/14
    Author:
    Akiko Iwamizu
